question.questionText: The distance between the driver and the steering should be at least _________
Your headlights must be turned on and used
question.answerText: at sunset and used until sun rise
only when there are so street lights
15 minutes before sunset and 15 minutes after sunrise

question.questionText: Under ideal driving conditions, unless traffic signs indicate otherwise, the speed limit in alleys should be
Parking your vehicle is not allowed
If you plan to pass another vehicle, you should
question.answerText: Not assume that the other driver will make space for you to return to your lane
Assume the other driver will let you pass if you use your turn signal
Assume the other driver will maintain a constant speed
Assume that it is your right of way if the other driver is driving too slow

question.questionText: A school bus is stopped with its red lights flashing and its stop arm extended, you must stop your vehicle at least __ from the bus
Consuming alcohol acts a
A solid yellow line next to a broken yellow line means that
question.answerText: vehicles in both direction may pass
only the vehicle next to solid line may pass
vehicles in both direction cannot pass
only the vehicle next to broken yellow line may pass

question.questionText: When you see a flashing yellow traffic signal at an upcoming intersection, you should
question.answerText: slow down and cross the intersection carefully
stop before entering the intersection as long as you can do so safely
stop. Yield to all cross traffic before crossing the intersection

question.questionText: If you are driving and a dust storm blows across the freeway causing reduced visibility, you should reduce your speed and
Before you make a left hand turn you must signal continuously during the last ______ before the turn
You may legally block an intersection
question.answerText: when you entered an intersection on a green light
under no circumstances you can legally block an intersection
when there is heavy traffic during peak hours
when the traffic signal shows a flashing yellow

question.questionText: What should you do if there is an emergency vehicle with flashing lights behind you while you are in an intersection?
question.answerText: move to the left lane and stop
move to the right lane and stop
cross the intersection, proceed to the right lane and stop as soon as you can
continue through the intersection as slow as possible, and then stop

question.questionText: You can avoid dangerous last minute maneuvers by looking __________ ahead of your vehicle at all times
While waiting to turn
question.answerText: it is safe to turn your wheels pointing to the right direction if you intend to turn right
keep your wheels straight and your foot on the brake
point your wheels in the direction you intend to turn

question.questionText: You may not legally park your vehicle within 50 feet of a railroad crossing! True or False
If you're driving on an Interstate (freeway) and a car is attempting to merge into your lane, you should
question.answerText: if possible, safely make room for the merging vehicle
accelerate quickly to get out of the merging vehicles way
reduce your speed quickly so the other vehicle can merge
continue to drive at constant speed

question.questionText: At what time are you allowed to pass a school bus?
question.answerText: if another driver signals you to proceed
if the school bus is not in motion and the red lights are flashing
if the school bus is in motion

question.questionText: Which one of the following statements is true about blind spots
question.answerText: You can eliminate your blind spots by using your 2 outside mirrors
The proper use of all 3 mirrors will eliminate your blind spot
Blind spot applies ONLY to trucks and not for smaller vehicles
Tractor trailers and large vehicles have blind spots which are larger than most passenger vehicles

question.questionText: Children younger than _____ of age should be secured in a child safety restraint system
You headlights must be turned on anytime you cannot clearly see the road ahead for a distance of at least ________
On an interstate freeway U-turns are
Which one of these statments is true about seat belts?
question.answerText: if you are driving below or as low ar 12 mph you do not need seat belts
seat belt is not required by occupants sitting on the back seat
your chances of surviving a car crash is more if you use the lap and shoulder belts together

question.questionText: Your headlights must be set to low beam when you are within _________ of an on-coming vehicle
When a vehicle is properly parallel parked, its wheels on the curb side should be positioned no more than _________ from the curb
Airbags are designed to keep the occupants from being ejected. True or false
Road signs in Red color indicate
Driving in minnesota is
question.answerText: the right of every US citizen
the right of every minnesota resident

question.questionText: Double solid white lines
question.answerText: indicate that lane change is prohibited in areas where this type of marking is present
indicate that lane change is allowed
separates lanes of traffic in opposite direction

question.questionText: Under ideal driving conditions driving faster than the posted speed limit
question.answerText: is legal if your speed is within +10 mph over the posted speed limit
is legal if the other traffic is driving faster than the posted speed limit
is legal if there is no other vehicle in your lane ahead of your vehicle

question.questionText: Parking is allowed at the street end of a driveway. True or False
In urban or town roads under ideal driving conditions the speed limit is ______
Which one of these statements is true about roundabouts?
question.answerText: do not stop, pass or change lanes within a roundabout
roundabouts are designed to increase the traffic flow
slow down as you approach the roundabout

question.questionText: If transit or metro mobility bus is attempting to merge from a bus stop or from a shoulder
question.answerText: drivers in the right lane of traffic must yield
drivers in the right lane of traffic have the right of way
drivers in the right lane of traffic accelerate quickly

question.questionText: It is legal to block a crosswalk if it is unmarked
It is illegal to pass another vehicle that has stopped for a pedastrian
If an emergency vehicle approaching you is separted from your lane of traffic by a physical barrier such as a fence, wall, or a median then
question.answerText: you must slow down your vehicle
you must pull to the right and stop
you must pull to whichever side is the nearest and stop
you do not have to stop

question.questionText: While passing a bicylist, there should be at least _______ between the side of your car and the bicylist
Blue road signs are
When you are following another vehicle at a distance of 200 feet or less then your headlights must be set on ________
Because of the size, an approaching train appears to be travelling at a slower speed. True or false
Which of the following is FALSE about passing on right. The driver of a vehicle may overtake and pass on the right of another vehicle
question.answerText: if there is sufficient width for two or more lanes of traffic moving in the same direction and the roadway is free from obstructions such as parked vehicles
by driving on the shoulder if the shoulder is unpaved
when the vehicle overtaken is making or about to make a left turn

question.questionText: When the front of a parked vehicle points uphill and there is no curb, the wheels should
question.answerText: point towards the shoulder of the road away from the traffic
point away from the shoulder of the road towards the traffic

question.questionText: When you are merging on to the freeway, you should be driving
question.answerText: 5 or 10 miles slower than the traffic on the freeway
at or the near the same speed as the traffic on the freeway

question.questionText: Parking is illegal along the yellow curb
U-turns are illegal on curves where other drivers cannot see you from _________ away
When a vehicle is properly parallel parked its wheels on the curb side will be positioned no more than __ inches from the curb
Before entering a road from a private driveway and there is no STOP sign
question.answerText: stop only if there is a STOP sign
slow down and look in right and then left direction
you have the right of way

question.questionText: When you are following a commercial vehicle at night
question.answerText: you should follow closely so that the commercial vehicle can see your vehicle
always change your headlights on high beam so that the commercial vehicle can see it in its large side mirrors

question.questionText: Which one of these statements should you obey the over all other?
question.answerText: obey the hand signals you are given by the law enforecement officer

question.questionText: If your vehicle begins to hydroplane
question.answerText: take the foot of the gas pedal
gently pump your your brake pedal
apply more pressure to the gas pedal so as to increase the speed

question.questionText: It is legal to stop a vehicle on the interstate freeway if you run out of fuel
A center lane between lanes of traffic in opposite direction
question.answerText: serves as a median separating flow of traffic in opposite direction
serves as a passing lane if it is safe to do so
may be designated for left turns only

question.questionText: It is illegal to pass any vehicle within ________ of a rail road crossing
Children under 8 years of age and under 4 feet 9 inches tall
question.answerText: must sit in a forward facing booster seat used with both adult lap and shoulder belt
must sit in a rear facing child restraint system
can sit in the front seat if the vehicle has air bags

question.questionText: A flashing red light traffic signal means
question.answerText: slow down and drive with caution
come to a complete stop and treat it like a STOP sign

question.questionText: When you see an emergency vehicle with lights flashing and siren activated behind you
question.answerText: slam on the brake pedal and stop
swerve into the other lane if possible to let the vehicle pass
use your turn signal and move to the nearest side of the road and then stop

question.questionText: If your headlights suddenly go out (stop working) what will you do that will give you enough light to guide you to drive off the road?
It is lawful to allow a passenger sitting in the back seat of the vehicle to have an open container of an alcoholic beverage
Which one of these can use high occupany vehicle lanes
question.answerText: vehicles carrying two or more people

question.questionText: A flashing yellow light or yellow arrow means
question.answerText: proceed through the intersection with caution
yield right of way to vehicles and pedestrian already in the intersection
come to a complete stop and treat it like a STOP sign

question.questionText: If you are involved in a crash
question.answerText: pull off the driving lane if possible and turn of the ignition to prevent risk of fire
do what you can to make injured persons comfortable
call nearest law enforcement agency or 911 quickly if someone is injured or killed in the crash

question.questionText: When two vehicles approach an uncontrolled 'T' intersection
question.answerText: the driver of the vehicle turning left must yield to cross traffic
the driver of the vehicle turning right must yield to cross traffic
the driver of the vehicle making a turn must yield to cross traffic

question.questionText: Commercial vehicle 'no zone' area includes
question.answerText: front and back of the commercial vehicle
on both the sides of the commercial vehicle

question.questionText: When two vehicles reach an intersection at the same time, and there is no traffic light or signal, then the driver of
question.answerText: the vehicle on the right must yield to the vehicle on the left
the heavy vehicle has the right-of-way
the vehicle on the left must yield to the vehicle on the right
the vehicle who signals first has the right-of-way

question.questionText: Backing up is not allowed on freeways or expressway, except by
If you are driving at a slower speed than other traffic on road with two or more lanes in the same direction of the traffic, you must stay in the lane
question.answerText: nearest to the center of the road
nearest to the shoulder of the road
nearest to the left side of the road
farthest from the right side of the road

question.questionText: If you are pulling a camper or trailer with your vehicle, you must maintain at least _______ following distance from other vehicles
If a blind pedestrian is waiting at a crosswalk with a white cane or a guide dog, you must
question.answerText: use your horn to alert them of your presence
reduce your speed and proceed slowly
increase your speed and move quickly
not use your horn or rev your engine

question.questionText: When passing another vehicle, you must:
question.answerText: return to the right side of the road before coming within 200 feet of an oncoming vehicle
return to the left side of the road before coming within 200 feet of an oncoming vehicle
return to the right side of the road before coming within 100 feet of an oncoming vehicle
return to the left side of the road before coming within 100 feet of an oncoming vehicle

question.questionText: An __________ is the connection of a freeway to a road or another freeway by a series of ramps
When making a right turn, look right and left, yield right-of-way, and turn the steering wheel using
Anyone who flees a police officer using a motor vehicle is sentenced to imprisonment for not more than
Passing a commercial vehicle takes _________ compared to a passenger vehicle on a level highway
When you wish to change lanes or make a turn, you must _________, to inform other motorists of your intentions
question.answerText: signal at least 50 feet in advance
signal at least 75 feet in advance
signal at least 25 feet in advance
signal at least 100 feet in advance
